name: SUN2000
description: SUN2000 is a mobile application software to communicate to inverter via Bluetooth for query alarms, configuration parameters, log downloading,spot check, inspection,DC in Detection,firmware upgrade routine maintenance functions, are lightweight proximal maintenance platform.   Fault management: easy to operate alarm browsing, fault management, operation and maintenance to enhance user productivity.   Flexible historical alarm query mechanism to facilitate customer inquiries device health history.   Get fast fault location, ease of maintenance personnel to quickly locate the fault, timely response measures.  Log Download: Download inverters related logs, user-friendly analysis of the problem.  Spot Check: Check the spot-check terminal signal and ensure that the protection value of the AC relay equals the preset protection value .  Inspection: Inspect the inverter regularly to avoid potential safety problems  DC in Detection:Check the wiring safety before start the machine to avoid safety accidents happening.
